The presence of misleading posts on soci: such as Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, that shared the claim about the death of Rashid Minhas' mother.
The inclusion of two images in the misle: one showing Rashid Minhas in uniform and the other showing his mother with her eyes closed.
The text accompanying the images in Engl: stating that the proud mother of Shaheed Rashid Minhas had passed away.
The statement from Rashid Minhas: brother, Anjum Minhas, confirming that the posts were false and that their mother was alive and well, as supported by his interviews with news outlets and the Facebook page he administers.
